titleStmt.title: A sermon prepared to be preached at the funerall of Walter Norbane, esq; by W. Haywood Dr. in divinity: one of the chaplains in ordinary to his late Majesty of glorious memory.
titleStmt.author: Haywood, William, 1599 or 1600-1663.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed for Richard Thrale at the Cross-Keyes at S. Pauls-Gate, entring into Cheapside,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.

place.placeName: the Cross-Keyes at S. Pauls-Gate, entring into Cheapside
